lead_paragraph: Kevin Pearce, a favorite to make the Olympic team, struck his head and was knocked unconscious while attempting a supremely difficult trick, the double cork.
snippet: Kevin Pearce, a favorite to make the Olympic team, struck his head and was knocked unconscious while attempting a supremely difficult trick, the double cork.

headline.seo: Snowboarder Pearce Is Critically Injured on a Halfpipe Run
headline.print_headline: Pearce Is Critically Injured On Halfpipe
